meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>scarlet</kanji> colored <kanji>carp</kanji> is called a <vocabulary>red carp</vocabulary> and sometimes a <vocabulary>golden carp</vocabulary> because sometimes people don't understand colors.
readingMnemonic: The reading is a combination of on'yomi and kun'yomi. That being said, both readings for both kanji are the readings you learned with the kanji so you should be able to read this.
